name: Im Yours
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
Song: I'm Yours
Artist: Jason Mraz

I watched him play this so im quite sure bout it!
This is the best easy way to play this song!
It has this nice reggae beat, fun to play!
I took it from the higher A to get the semi-harmonics sound!
No Capo
Original key is B (capo 2nd fret) but i made it lower coz its harder!
So here goes...


    [ch]A[/ch]   [ch]E[/ch]  [ch]F#m[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]  [ch]D7[/ch]* [ch]C#m[/ch]  [ch]Bm[/ch]
E|--5---7---9---10--10--9---7--||
A|--5---7---10--10--13--9---7--||
D|--6---9---11--11--11--9---7--||
G|--7---9---11--12--10--11--9--||
B|--7---7---9---12--12--11--9--||
E|--5---7---9---10--10--9---7--||


[Verse]

     [ch]A[/ch]
Well you done done me in, you bet I felt it
   [ch]E[/ch]
I tried to be chill but you're so hot that I melted,
  [ch]F#m[/ch]
I fell right through the cracks,
[ch]D[/ch]
And now I'm tryin to get back....
            [ch]A[/ch]
Before the cool done run out, I'll be givin it my bestest
      [ch]E[/ch]
And nothing's going to stop me but divine intervention
    [ch]F#m[/ch]
I reckon its again my turn,
    [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]D7[/ch]*
To win some or learn some....


[Chorus 1]

[ch]A[/ch]               [ch]E[/ch]
But I wont hesitate
            [ch]F#m[/ch]
No more, no more
            [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]D7[/ch]*    [ch]A[/ch]---[ch]E[/ch]--[ch]F#m[/ch]---[ch]D[/ch]----[ch]D7[/ch]*
It can not wait, I'm yours


[Verse 2]

[ch]A[/ch]                                   [ch]E[/ch]
Well open up your mind and see like me
                                 [ch]F#m[/ch]
open up your plans & then your free
                                     [ch]D[/ch]
look into your heart and you'll find love love love
[ch]A[/ch]                                                          [ch]E[/ch]
Listen to the music of the moment come and sing/dance with me
                    [ch]F#m[/ch]
We're just one big family
                                       [ch]D[/ch]                       [ch]D7[/ch]*
And it's our God-forsaken right to be loved loved loved loved loved

(repeat Chorus except last word)

sure..


[Chorus 2]

            [ch]A[/ch]             [ch]E[/ch]
There's no need to complicate
              [ch]F#m[/ch]
Our time is short
             [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]D7[/ch]*
This is our fate i'm yours..


[Adlib]

 [ch]Do[/ch] [ch]A[/ch]-[ch]E[/ch]-[ch]F#m[/ch]-[ch]C#m[/ch]-[ch]Bm[/ch]--[ch]D[/ch]-[ch]D7[/ch]*   x2

3rd Verse (Same as other Verses)

(Chorus 1 & 2)

that's it!
enjoy!
please rate this, i worked hard for this...

content.text:
Tune down 1/2 step to match the recording.


[Intro]
[ch]C[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]Am[/ch]  [ch]F[/ch]

[Verse]
      [ch]C[/ch]
Well, you done done me an' you bet I felt it.
  [ch]G[/ch]
I tried to be chill, but you're so hot that I melted.
  [ch]Am[/ch]
I fell right through the cracks.
        [ch]F[/ch]
Now I'm trying to get back.

[ch]C[/ch]                                                   [ch]G[/ch]
Before the cool done run out, I'll be giving it my bestest,
                       [ch]Am[/ch]
And nothing's gonna stop me but divine intervention.
                                      [ch]F[/ch]
I reckon it's again my turn
                     [ch]D7/F#[/ch]
To win some or learn some.

[Chorus]
    [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]
But I won't hesitate no more, no more.
          [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]
It cannot wait, I'm yours.
    [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]
Mm, mm, hmm, mm...
                       [ch]F[/ch]
Hey, hey-ey, hey, hey, hey...

[Verse]
[ch]C[/ch]                                    [ch]G[/ch]
Well, open up your mind and see like me.
                                     [ch]Am[/ch]
Open up your plans and, damn, you're free.
                                     [ch]F[/ch]
Look into your heart and you'll find love, love, love, love.

[ch]C[/ch]                                                   [ch]G[/ch]
Listen to the music of the moment; people dance and sing.
                       [ch]Am[/ch]
We're just one big family.
                                      [ch]F[/ch]
And it's our god forsaken right to be loved,
                     [ch]D7/F#[/ch]
Loved, loved, loved, loved.

[Chorus]
   [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]
So I won't hesitate no more, no more.
          [ch]F[/ch]
It cannot wait, I'm sure.
           [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]
There's no need to complicate.
            [ch]Am[/ch]
Our time is short.
            [ch]F[/ch]
This is our fate, I'm yours.
[ch]C[/ch]       [ch]G/B[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]
Tuch-tu...
               [ch]F[/ch]
Skooch on over closer, dear,
                       [ch]D7/F#[/ch]
And I will nibble your ear.

[Interlude]
|[ch]C[/ch]   [ch]G/B[/ch]  |[ch]Am[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]   |[ch]F[/ch]       |[ch]D7/F#[/ch]   |

[Verse]
                   [ch]C[/ch]
I've been spending way too long checking my tongue in the mirror
    [ch]G[/ch]
And bending over backwards just to try to see it clearer.
    [ch]Am[/ch]
But my breath fogged up the glass,
         [ch]F[/ch]
And so I drew a new face and I laughed.
  [ch]C[/ch]
I guess what I'll be saying is there ain't no better reason
   [ch]G[/ch]
To rid yourself of vanities and just go with the seasons.
[ch]Am[/ch]
It's what we aim to do.
    [ch]F[/ch]
Our name is our virtue.

[Chorus/Outro]
    [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]
But I won't hesitate no more, no more.
          [ch]F[/ch]
It cannot wait, I'm yours.
[ch]C[/ch]                              [ch]G[/ch]
Open up your mind and see like me.
                                     [ch]Am[/ch]
Open up your plans and, damn, you're free.
                                     [ch]F[/ch]
Look into your heart and you'll find that the sky is yours.
   [ch]C[/ch]
So please don't, please don't, please don't...
           [ch]G[/ch]
There's no need to complicate.
           [ch]Am[/ch]
'Cause our time is short.
                              [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]D7/F#[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch] [ch]G[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]
This, oh this, oh this is our fate. I'm yours.

These are the chords and timings to the newly (3rd Jan 2012) released single version of 
"I wont give up"
This is just a quick notation of the chords and their place in the song. The bridge "I 
don't wanna be someone.." sounds right to me but is the only part im not sure about.
Capo 2.

(Check out the other tabs for the intro/first verse rif or just play G and D)

Or a beautiful sun...rise
  ([ch]Bm[/ch])                   [ch]A[/ch]
Well there's so much they hold
                   [ch]G[/ch]   [ch]D[/ch]
And just like them old stars

I see that you've come so far

To be right where you are
[ch]Bm[/ch]              [ch]A[/ch]
How old is your soul?

I won't give up.. on.. us...

Even if the skies.. get.. rough

                  [ch]A[/ch]

content.text:
[Intro]

[ch]D[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch] [ch]Dsus2[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] x2 


[Verse]

[ch]G[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]
Hey! Mr. Tambourine Man, play a song for me,
        [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]A[/ch]         [ch]Asus4[/ch] [ch]A[/ch]
I'm not sleepy and there is no place I'm going to.
[ch]G[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]
Hey! Mr. Tambourine Man, play a song for me,
       [ch]D[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]A[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]   [ch]Dsus4[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] [ch]Dsus2[/ch] [ch]D[/ch]
In the jingle jangle morning I'll come followin' you.

          [ch]G[/ch]                  [ch]A[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]
Though I know that evenin's empire has returned into sand,
  [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]
Vanished from my hand,
          [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]A[/ch]     [ch]Asus4[/ch] [ch]A[/ch]
Left me blindly here to stand but still not sleeping.
   [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]A[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]
My weariness amazes me, I'm branded on my feet,
  [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
I have no one to meet
         [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]A[/ch]     [ch]Asus4[/ch] [ch]A[/ch]
And the ancient empty street's too dead for dreaming.

[ch]G[/ch]            [ch]A[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]
Take me on a trip upon your magic swirlin' ship,
   [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]
My senses have been stripped, my hands can't feel to grip,
   [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]
My toes too numb to step, wait only for my boot heels
      [ch]A[/ch]
To be wanderin'.
    [ch]G[/ch]           [ch]A[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]
I'm ready to go anywhere, I'm ready for to fade
  [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
Into my own parade, cast your dancing spell my way,
                [ch]A[/ch]
I promise to go under it.


[Chorus]

[ch]G[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]
Hey! Mr. Tambourine Man, play a song for me,
        [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]A[/ch]         [ch]Asus4[/ch] [ch]A[/ch]

[ch]G[/ch]        [ch]A[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]

       [ch]D[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]A[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]   [ch]Dsus4[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] [ch]Dsus2[/ch] [ch]D[/ch]

[Verse]

           [ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]A[/ch]                  [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]
Though you might hear laughin', spinnin', swingin' madly across the sun,
         [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]

                [ch]D[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]             [ch]A[/ch]

    [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]A[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]

   [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]

   [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]

Then take me disappearin' through the smoke rings of my mind,
         [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]
Down the foggy ruins of time, far past the frozen leaves,
    [ch]D[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]
The haunted, frightened trees, out to the windy beach,
